item.description:
Dear Members,

We could not get Nov. 2 at Especially for Pets which I had wanted for our Halloween Party, and they don't have any other Sundays available in October, so Nov. 16 from 2-5pm will be our Halloween Party!

The best part are the hours we've reserved, which are usually impossible to get because of other classes that they have scheduled.

If everyone can bring food or drink if they want to, like last time, that would be terrific! I will attempt to bring paper plates, utensils and cups.

Costumes on our Maltese are optional but encouraged!

Maltese best,
Kim
laptopmaltese@aol.com
508 380 6829
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my name tag on, "Kim" or you can ask anyone where I am.

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Maltese Meet, Nov. 16, 2 - 5 pm, Espec. for Pets, Sudbury, MA
